original_text: From these the coastland peoples spread in their lands, each with his own language, by their clans, in their nations.
korean_text: 이들로부터 여러 나라 백성으로 나뉘어서 각기 언어와 종족과 나라대로 바닷가의 땅에 머물렀더라

sentences.original_text: From these the coastland peoples spread in their lands
sentences.korean_translation: 이들로부터 해안 족속들이 자기 땅에 퍼져나갔고
